entry.title: [SQ] So, this is going to be a case of "sheltered religious conservative doesn't unde
entry.content:
So, this is going to be a case of "sheltered religious conservative doesn't understand slang" but... what is a fuckboy? The term was referenced in a YouTube video I watched and I looked it up, all I got were definitions like "a guy who lies to women to get sex," "a serial monogamist who convinces women he loves them but just wants sex"... basically the key points were 1) wanting sex not a relationship and 2) willing to lie to women about their intentions.
Is that it? I dunno, I guess it just seems like that's a very imprecise definition for a word like that. Do the definitions I found exhaust the meaning of the word or am I missing something?
